_header: Saint John the gospeller / Tells as I shall you lere
_description: Gospel for the Twenty-fourth (according to some MSS the Twenty-fifth) Sunday after Trinity in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
SAynte Jone þe gode gospellereTellis als i sall saie ȝou
                    here…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…He askid sainte philipe in hyeWhare maie we mete to þis
                    folk bye
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Ion þe gospellereTelleþ þat I schal sei ow
                    here…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat may ȝe bi a tale hereÞat I haue redi Rymed
                    here
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Cum subleuasset Ihesu oculos / et uidisset quia multitudo maxima (f.
                        214vc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULGg531.First Lines:
Seynt Iohn þe gospilereTelles als I sall ȝow
                    lere…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…He asked saint Philypp in hyWhar may we mete tyll þis
                    folk by…
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
Dominica xxxiiiima post trinitatem secundum Iohannem (f.
                    154v)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
SEint Ion þe gospelerTelleþ þat I schal sei
                    owhere…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Þat may ȝe bi a tale hereþat I have redi rymed
                    here
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title:
Cum subsenasset oculos Ihesus & videsset / quia multitudo maxima
                        venit (f. 18rc)
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
